content:
{"settings":"{
  "editor.lineHeight": 40,
  "editor.letterSpacing": 0,
  "editor.fontSize": 14,
  "terminal.integrated.fontSize": 10,
  "editor.fontFamily": "Iosevka SS04 Medium",
  "editor.semanticHighlighting.enabled": false,
  "editor.suggestFontSize": 16,
  "editor.suggestLineHeight": 28,

  "editor.formatOnSave": true,
  "editor.codeActionsOnSave": {
    "source.fixAll.eslint": true
  },
  "[typescript]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode",
    "editor.formatOnSave": true
  },
  "[typescriptreact]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode",
    "editor.formatOnSave": true
  },
  "[javascript]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode",
    "editor.formatOnSave": true
  },
  "[json]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode",
    "editor.formatOnSave": true
  },
  "[svelte]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "svelte.svelte-vscode",
    "editor.formatOnSave": false
  },
  "[php]": {
    "editor.formatOnPaste": false,
    "editor.formatOnSave": false
  },
  "[njk]": {
    // "editor.formatOnPaste": false,
    // "editor.formatOnSave": false
  },
  // ESLINT
  "eslint.alwaysShowStatus": true,
  "eslint.workingDirectories": [
    {
      "mode": "auto"
    }
  ],
  "eslint.validate": [
    "html",
    "javascript",
    "javascriptreact",
    "typescript",
    "typescriptreact"
  ],

  "prettier.trailingComma": "es5",

  // EMMET
  "emmet.includeLanguages": {
    "javascript": "javascriptreact",
    "typescript": "javascriptreact",
    "ruby": "html",
    "erb": "html",
    "njk": "html"
  },

  "editor.tabCompletion": "onlySnippets",
  "editor.tabSize": 2,
  "editor.insertSpaces": false,
  "editor.wordWrap": "on",
  "workbench.editor.tabSizing": "shrink",
  "editor.fontLigatures": false,
  "explorer.openEditors.visible": 0,
  "breadcrumbs.enabled": true,
  "tailwindCSS.emmetCompletions": true,
  "files.trimTrailingWhitespace": true,
  "files.trimFinalNewlines": true,
  "editor.cursorBlinking": "phase",
  "editor.cursorStyle": "line",
  "explorer.confirmDelete": false,
  "files.autoSave": "afterDelay",
  "files.autoSaveDelay": 5000,
  "editor.multiCursorModifier": "ctrlCmd",
  "workbench.sideBar.location": "right",
  "workbench.fontAliasing": "antialiased",
  "editor.renderWhitespace": "all",
  "disableLigatures.mode": "Cursor",
  "files.associations": {
    "*.html": "njk"
  },
  "search.exclude": {
    "**/node_modules": true,
    "**/bower_components": true,
    "**/*.code-search": true,
    "**/_site": true,
    "_site": true,
    "**/build": true,
    "**/bin": true,
    "**/*.svg": true
  },
  "advancedNewFile.exclude": {
    "**/_site": true,
    "**/node_modules": true,
    "dist": true,
    "**/build": true,
    "**/bin": true
  },
  "files.exclude": {
    "**/.git": true,
    "**/.svn": true,
    "**/.hg": true,
    "**/CVS": true,
    "**/.DS_Store": true,
    "**/node_modules": true,
    "**/build": true,
    "USE_GITIGNORE": true
  },
  "workbench.colorTheme": "Everforest Dark",
  "omnisharp.useGlobalMono": "never",
  "typescript.updateImportsOnFileMove.enabled": "always",
  "javascript.updateImportsOnFileMove.enabled": "always",
  "omnisharp.enableEditorConfigSupport": true,
  "git.enableSmartCommit": true,
  "git.autofetch": true,
  "search.quickOpen.history.filterSortOrder": "recency",
  "search.quickOpen.includeHistory": false,
  "search.sortOrder": "type",
  "search.searchEditor.reusePriorSearchConfiguration": true,
  "search.actionsPosition": "right",
  "search.collapseResults": "auto",
  "debug.onTaskErrors": "debugAnyway",
  "workbench.iconTheme": "vscode-great-icons",
  "workbench.quickOpen.closeOnFocusLost": false,
  "scm.diffDecorationsGutterVisibility": "hover",
  "editor.suggestSelection": "first",
  "vsintellicode.modify.editor.suggestSelection": "automaticallyOverrodeDefaultValue",
  "terminal.integrated.fontFamily": "Fira Code",
  "window.title": "${folderName}",
  "python.languageServer": "Microsoft",

  // ZEN MODE
  "zenMode.hideLineNumbers": true,
  "zenMode.hideStatusBar": false,
  "zenMode.fullScreen": false,
  "workbench.editor.showTabs": false,
  "editor.minimap.enabled": false,
  "editor.codeLens": false,

  // CLEAN IT UP
  "workbench.startupEditor": "none",
  "editor.renderControlCharacters": false,
  "editor.renderIndentGuides": false,
  "editor.renderLineHighlight": "none",
  "editor.matchBrackets": "never",
  "editor.lineNumbers": "on",

  // UTILS
  "editor.snippetSuggestions": "top",
  // When I accidentally hit copy without selecting anything and it overrides my clipboard - ugh.
  "editor.emptySelectionClipboard": false,
  // I removed the hyphen "-" from this list for better multi-cursor navigation.
  // @freekmurze suggested I remove "$" too for php variables - brilliant!
  "editor.wordSeparators": "`~!@#%^&*()=+[{]}\\|;:'\",.<>/?",
  // Give it to me as fast as you have it.
  "editor.quickSuggestionsDelay": 0,
  // In sublime I got used to almost exclusively using "cmd+shift+v" (format on paste) - now it will do it by default!
  "editor.formatOnPaste": true,
  // Show me whitespace in diffs, just in case some slips through, shows up in the GitHub PR, and I look like a dummy.
  "diffEditor.ignoreTrimWhitespace": false,

  // WINDOW
  "window.newWindowDimensions": "offset",

  // OMNISHARP
  "omnisharp.enableRoslynAnalyzers": true,
  "omnisharp.enableImportCompletion": true,
  "[jsonc]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode"
  },
  "editor.stablePeek": true,
  "mssql.connections": [
    {
      "server": "localhost",
      "database": "Onyx",
      "authenticationType": "SqlLogin",
      "user": "sa",
      "password": "",
      "emptyPasswordInput": false,
      "savePassword": true,
      "profileName": "Onyx"
    },
    {
      "server": "localhost",
      "database": "Maintenance4Dev01",
      "authenticationType": "SqlLogin",
      "user": "sa",
      "password": "",
      "emptyPasswordInput": false,
      "savePassword": true,
      "profileName": "Maintenance"
    }
  ],
  "settingsSync.ignoredExtensions": [
    "ms-dotnettools.vscode-dotnet-runtime",
    "ms-vscode-remote.remote-containers",
    "denoland.vscode-deno"
  ],
  "debug.allowBreakpointsEverywhere": true,
  "extensions.ignoreRecommendations": true,
  "editor.columnSelection": false,
  "workbench.tree.indent": 20,

  // twin.macro settings
  "scss.validate": false,
  "editor.quickSuggestions": {
    "strings": true
  },
  "editor.autoClosingQuotes": "always",
  "tailwindCSS.experimental.classRegex": [
    "tw`([^`]*)", // tw`...`
    "tw=\"([^\"]*)", // <div tw="..." />
    "tw={\"([^\"}]*)", // <div tw={"..."} />
    "tw\\.\\w+`([^`]*)", // tw.xxx`...`
    "tw\\(.*?\\)`([^`]*)" // tw(Component)`...`
  ],
  "tailwindCSS.includeLanguages": {
    "typescript": "javascript",
    "typescriptreact": "javascript"
  },
  "ruby.useBundler": true, //run non-lint commands with bundle exec
  "ruby.useLanguageServer": true, // use the internal language server (see below)
  "ruby.lint": {
    "rubocop": {
      "useBundler": true // enable rubocop via bundler
    },
    "reek": {
      "useBundler": true // enable reek via bundler
    }
  },
  "ruby.format": "prettier",
  "[html]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode"
  },
  "razor.disabled": true,
  "razor.format.enable": false,
  "editor.linkedEditing": true,
  "go.toolsManagement.autoUpdate": true,
  "workbench.activityBar.visible": false,
  "window.zoomLevel": 1,
  "omnisharp.organizeImportsOnFormat": true,
  "editor.detectIndentation": false // use rubocop for formatting
}
"}
